ygData.subject: Re: I'm a guide =D
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Joseph, You don t have to live near Verant to be a guide. You just have to apply and be accepted. I ll let everyone know my guide name when I m a guide, I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Joseph,

You don't have to live near Verant to be a guide. You just have to apply
and be accepted. I'll let everyone know my guide name when I'm a guide, I
won't give anyone any special treatment. I have to be an apprentice guide
for a while and I can't really do anything but unstuck corpses anyway =)

Tina

On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Joseph J. Normandin wrote:

> From: "Joseph J. Normandin" <josephn@...>
>
> If you are going ot be a GM on Rodcet you need to learn how to spell it
> first! :) Rodcet Nife <----- heheheh not Rodcet Knife ehhehehe
>
> Seriously though, that is really cool i wisjh i lived in that area so i culd
> be a guide :) if we ahve issues in the game can we contac you personally?
> or is that a breach of ethics?
>
> good luck!
>
> -joe
> =============================
> Joseph J. Normandin
> josephn@...
> =============================
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Christina Norman" <tina@...>
> To: <EQ_Rainbow@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, January 28, 2000 1:44 AM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] I'm a guide =D
>
>
> > From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> >
> >
> > My guide application was accepted, and I've been selected to serve on
> > Rodcet Knife. This was a wondeful surprise for me, as I know a lot of
> people
> > on this list play there. I won't be giving any preferential treatment
> > of course, but it will be nice to be able to say hi to you all =)
> >
> > My training is happening this Saturday, I'm not sure when I'll start
> guiding.
> >
> > - Tina
> >
